name: MT205 to pacs.009 Document Mapping for CBPR+
description: Maps MT205 message to ISO 20022 pacs.009.001.08 FinancialInstitutionCreditTransferV08 document structure according to CBPR+ translation specification for Corporate payments

tasks.name: Extract Sender and Receiver BICs
tasks.description: Extracts sender and receiver BIC codes from SwiftMT headers for use throughout the document mapping

tasks.name: METAFCT003: Complete Settlement Method and Agents Determination for MT205
tasks.description: Implements complete METAFCT003 logic for MT205 with all scenarios from Settlement Method&Agents-Table 1.csv

tasks.name: Construct Group Header
tasks.description: Builds pacs.009 group header with message identification, creation timestamp, settlement information, and reimbursement agent details from MT205 fields and computed settlement method using structural output

tasks.name: Map Payment Identification
tasks.description: Maps payment identification fields (InstrId, EndToEndId, UETR) from MT205

tasks.name: Map Settlement Amount
tasks.description: Maps interbank settlement amount from field 32A

tasks.name: Map Instructing and Instructed Agents
tasks.description: Maps instructing and instructed agents from message sender/receiver

tasks.name: Map Debtor Information
tasks.description: Maps debtor and debtor account from field 52A

tasks.name: Map Payment Type Information
tasks.description: Maps service level, local instrument, category purpose, and clearing channel

tasks.name: Map Settlement Time Indication
tasks.description: Maps settlement time indication from field 13C

tasks.name: Map Instructions with TR008 Implementation
tasks.description: Maps instructions for next agent as per TR008 including /FIN54/ for serial payments and field 72 codes

tasks.name: Map Remittance Information and Purpose
tasks.description: Maps remittance information and purpose from field 72

tasks.name: Map Previous Instructing Agents
tasks.description: Maps previous instructing agents if present

tasks.name: Publish MX Message
tasks.description: Publish the complete MX message with AppHdr and Document
